{{cpp/experimental/shared_future/title|operator{{=}}}}
{{cpp/experimental/concurrency/shared_future/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|1=
std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp; operator=( const std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp; other );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|1=
std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp; operator=( std::experimental::shared_future&lt;T&gt;&amp;&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Assigns the contents of another {{tt|std::experimental::shared_future}} object.
@1@ Releases any shared state and assigns the contents of {{c|other}} to {{c|*this}}. After the assignment, {{c|this-&gt;valid() {{==}} other.valid()}}.
@2@ Releases any shared state and move-assigns the contents of {{c|other}} to {{c|*this}}. After the assignment, {{c|other.valid() {{==}} false}} and {{lc|valid|this-&gt;valid()}} will yield the same value as {{c|other.valid()}} before the assignment.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|a {{tt|std::experimental::shared_future}} object to assign from}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}
